name: Cabanas-Esposende
title: (4740) Cabanas-Esposende
description:
S. LOURENÇO, VILA CHÃ - ESPOSENDE PANORAMIC VIEW
Highest points of the fossil cliffs, line that separates the coastal plain of the first reliefs over the spring. You can see a vast expanse around! For the sides of the Sea, the view can stretch up to Esposende and Fão, and perhaps distinguish the famous "Fão Horses," those rocks always beaten by the waves. If you follow the line marked by the Cávado, you may understand its tortuous passage through the fertile fields which gives life and freshness. There, far away, Mills S. Felix. Closer, another hill as that where you are, Mount Faro. But the landscape to the east also has its charms: for more than three dozen kilometers, if the weather permits, you distinguish a good part of the topography of the Minho, to the Sameiro, as to the sides of Braga. And the north, another high point, more of a fossil cliff promontory, the Mount of Facho.                                                                         S. LOURENÇO INTERPRETIVE CENTER
The Interpretive Center of S. Lourenço (ICFTU), located in the municipality of Esposende, is a permanent institution, non-profit, which will be at the service of society, contributing to its progress. Aims to promote the cultural dynamics of an important archaeological site comprising the castro of St. Lawrence and an area which includes the surrounding area. Intends to leverage this attractive hub of the city, working with the scientific community information for educational and recreational purposes. The building also houses the Office of Cultural Heritage Authority that, in addition to the studies on the archaeological and historical heritage of the county, invests heavily in Educational Service directed a wide range of audiences. The ICFTU has two display areas: within permanent, which is intended sensory and interactive with the public, promotes the framework of space and transformations of the territory.Starts with the evolution of Fossil Cliff and human settlement until the Bronze Age, providing information about the binomial resources occupancy. Through a multimedia game and a movie titled "Caturo, the little warrior" the visitor is attracted to the evolution of the occupation of the archaeological site. The temporary exhibition area of ​​betting on the value of archeology and its importance in the investigation of the occupation of the hill of St. Lawrence. Make known St. Lawrence, as well as traditions associated with this location. Starting from the four principal occupation displays some of the booty recovered from the excavations. For this space was designed expository structure that promotes greater exhibition area, which is intended more settled.

title_short: (4900) Viana do Castelo - Rua da Veiga

title_short: (4900-355) Viana do Castelo - 72 Avenida do Atlântico

title: (4935) Vila Franca - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking, in theory it is for sports activity. We spent the afternoon watching surfers and the night quiet and alone with no problems.

title: (4900-858) Viana do Castelo -

title: (4480) Vila do Conde - 16 Rua do Cordoeiro
title_short: (4480) Vila do Conde - 16 Rua do Cordoeiro
description: Full every weekend by the campervans. Next to the beach. A bit difficult parking due to the sand on the ground.

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - Circuíto de Manutenção de Viana do Castelo
title_short: (4900) Viana do Castelo - Circuíto de Manutenção de Viana do Castelo
description:
Large site on subdivision still without construction for more than ten years.
View on the Lima. Very clean on cobblestones.
Very quiet, we go back every year and cross to go to Intermarché on the other side. Above the club of oars.
  No service.

address.street: Circuíto de Manutenção de Viana do Castelo

title: (4935) Vila Franca - Estrada de Manuel Espregueira
title_short: (4935) Vila Franca - Estrada de Manuel Espregueira
description: Nice place by the river under the eucalyptus trees with picnic tables, no problem to spend the night. Can turn left or right at the end of this paved road - right seems to have more morning activity. Locals come to fish and is super calm and quiet in early September. 4G signal! Fairly bumpy and narrow approach (may not be suitable for large campers over 6m).

title: (4900-317) Viana do Castelo -
description: Duchas

title: (4900-350) Viana do Castelo - 33 Avenida de Cabo Verde
title_short: (4900-350) Viana do Castelo - 33 Avenida de Cabo Verde
description:
[PORT]Estacionamento atrás do Hotel Flor de Sal...calmo e sossegado
[ENG] Parking behind Hotel Flor de Sal ... quiet and peaceful

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 36 Avenida de Cabo Verde
title_short: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 36 Avenida de Cabo Verde
description: Parking on the corner of the roundabout for large vehicles on level ground. the closest to the ride with games for children. We stopped for a few hours during the day with no problem. It has no shadows, but there are some bars in front and the road is next to it.

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 458 Rua Cidade de Riom

title_short: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 191 Rua do Socorro

title: () Viana do Castelo - Marginal

title: (4900-441) Viana do Castelo - 833 Rua da Bandeira
title_short: (4900-441) Viana do Castelo - 833 Rua da Bandeira
description: Laundromat with parking and wifi

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - N13-6
description: Room at side of road for one van/motorhome sheltered by trees. Nearby church with amazing views of the city.

title: (4480-655) Vila do Conde - 82 Avenida Baltazar do Couto
title_short: (4480-655) Vila do Conde - 82 Avenida Baltazar do Couto
description: Good laundromat! And easy parking next door.

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 249 N13-6
description: Parking day to visit the monument possibility of sleeping behind on the parking arrive preferably in the evening for 'e not embarrassed

title: (4900-716) Meadela - 49 Rua Padre Moreno
description: Self-service washing machines. Very clean store and fair prices.

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 168 Rua da Catalôa
title_short: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 168 Rua da Catalôa
description: Parking next to mercadona, ideal for shopping, visiting the city and even sleeping, little unevenness, no noise

title: (4480-669) Vila do Conde - 233 Acesso Particular
description: Parking at the roadside. Also suitable for large campers, provided there is space. Stood here for 2 hours to walk to the monastery. But also city sightseeing possible.

title: (4480-754) Vila do Conde - 31F Rua do Cais dos Assentos
title_short: (4480-754) Vila do Conde - 31F Rua do Cais dos Assentos
description: An excellent and modern launderette with large and small washers. Doesn't take credit cards though, only coins or a card that you have to buy separately (just take coins it's easier)

title: (4905) Deocriste - Veigas
description:
Situated right next to the river (strong current but possibility to walk just halfway in), there is plenty of space and a pretty landscape (if not for the rubbish, that sadly spoils a few of the surounding spots) and possibilities for children as well as for adults to play and explore.

There's a pipeline that leads down to the banks of the river Lima, it belongs to a nearby factory (that's also a little audible but has quite a decent sound). Also, there are plenty of gangplanks and benches with tables on the adjacent lawn, with even another possible parking spot next to it (to the right from the driveway).

The parking spaces are unpaved but mostly even. The driveway is slightly bumpy. It should all be fine for buses or smaller vans. There is a low-hanging tree over the driveway, but with only soft twigs coming in your way.

title: (4480-659) Vila do Conde - 582 Avenida do Brasil
title_short: (4480-659) Vila do Conde - 582 Avenida do Brasil
description: Parking at the back of some buildings and a restaurant, quiet area at least during the week, we spent one night, near the beach. At night there is enough room.

title: (4750-000) Porto - Autoestrada A3
description:
Service area with tree-lined picnic area.

There are also free showers with hot water.
Ask in the restaurant near the gas station for shower keys.

title: (4750-000) Porto -
description: There are some showers that belong to the restaurant. You leave them an identification document and they give you the key. There are separate men's and women's restrooms.

title: (4480-134) Azurara - 1 Rua Nossa Senhora das Neves
title_short: (4480-134) Azurara - 1 Rua Nossa Senhora das Neves
description: Laundry with excellent pizzeria more or less 50m away

title: (4480) Azurara - Rua das Salinas
description: Quiet beach. Several parking areas. Attention, place very badly attended the night.

name: Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
title: (4480-095) Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
title_short: (4480-095) Parque de Campismo de Vila do Conde
description:
Camping Vila do Conde / Árvore 

The Vila do Conde campsite is located in a magnificent location close to the beach. Equipped with excellent facilities, it provides all users with a pleasant leisure space during the holidays, but also a good place to rest throughout the year. 

Entrance: 9:00 am to 7:00 pm Departure: until 17:00 hours 

Visits: 9:00 to 24:00 hours 
Departure and entry of vehicles: 7:00 to 24:00 hours.

Adress: R. do Gaiato 300, 4480 Azurara, Portugal Azurara Porto 
Average Price: Between 20 & 30 EUR 
Capacity for Motorhomes (MotorHomes):  25 seats Coverage: Uncovered (Outdoors) 
Exclusive to Motorhomes: No 
Floor: Grass(Grass) 
Isolated: No 
Security: Very Good 
GPS: Latitude: 41.336199 - Longitude: -8.735268 DEGREES: 41 º 20' 10.316" - -8 º 44' 6.964"

title: (4750) Lama -
description: Source - Fonte da Poça. very idyllic spot in the middle of the forest just before Braga. A small nature and adventure area has been created around the source. All made very cute. Everywhere paths and paths that invite you to walk and cycle. The last end of the trail is off-road, but should be passable even with normal cars. With the ground clearance of a van or SUV you can definitely get here. The place is perhaps only suitable to a limited extent for overnight stays, as there is not much room to stand. But beautifully secluded in the forest.

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 9 Rua da Boa Viagem
title_short: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 9 Rua da Boa Viagem
description: Local name: Poço Negro. Local quiet place with small waterfalls and natural swimming pools. Completely empty (except in the summer peak). There’s a few roads where you can safely park in the shadow.

name: Woodstill Oaks
title: (4760-783) Woodstill Oaks
description:
We are creating a space inserted in nature.

Updates: 
- Access to the property widened to 4 meters;
- There are several vines sprouting through the ground. We kindly ask you to be as careful as possible when moving around the property;
- We kindly ask you to contact us to confirm space availability. 

Under development.
It is a property with natural fence about 50 meters from the municipal road in an extremely quiet place for contemplation of nature.  Access to the property is 4 meters wide.  At the moment we can only offer tranquility in a reserved space.  We love our trees very much;  some older than us.
 We kindly ask you to respect the space;  we have our vines growing and we think there is room for everyone, the campers and the existing nature.  We don't even have a garbage disposal as we believe that each user will take their own to the nearest place, about 150 meters from the exit.
 About 150 meters from the site, there is an equestrian center and an excellent restaurant if you want to try the local cuisine.  Within a radius of 1 km you can also visit good wine cellars and cheese makers selling to the public.  There are markets, bakeries and a bank very close to the site.
It is expressly forbidden to throw garbage to the floor and make fire.

title: (4480) Cabreiro - 685 Travessa de Farilhe
description: Official beach parking, easy access to dune walkway and beach. At the back of the restaurant are public toilets (not the cleanest) which are closed during the night. Right in front of the toilets are large waste containers and one foot shower. Sadly no 'real' showers on the whole (!) Beach.

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 52-72 Rua do Covelo
title_short: (4900) Viana do Castelo - 52-72 Rua do Covelo
description: Laundry in Internmarche supermarket, ample parking

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo -
description: Simple relatively flat area in front of a village (not in sight) surrounded by nature. In the village there are toilets, a picnic area and even showers (don't know if they still work). From here you can make great hikes even to the St Lucia of Viana or along old watercourses. We discovered the place on a hike, but you can probably spend the night there without any problems. More pitches sheltered from the wind directly opposite.

title: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Caminho Marginal Rio Lima
title_short: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Caminho Marginal Rio Lima
description: Bivouac by the river, easy access for 4x4, van, but not for camper. Tarmac road slightly sandy. Places for several vehicles.

title: (4925-628) Vila Mou - 222 Largo do Arco Festivo
title_short: (4925-628) Vila Mou - 222 Largo do Arco Festivo
description: Perfect parking to spend the night

title: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Veigas
title_short: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Veigas
description: Spacy unpaved area right next to the river Lima, the ground wavy but you should be able to position your vehicle evenly. Some thirty metres away there are houses, but it doesn't feel like parking in their garden. You can take some steps into the river, but beware if its strong current! There's a boat landing, but only some three or four boats lie there. Traffic noises are audible in the distance. Of course some people, also youngsters, pass by and enjoy the place. All in all, for me it was a quite agreeable mixture of private and taking notice of civilisation. The access road is unproblematic for medium-sized vehicles, except for the last meters that are quite bumpy so you better go pretty slow there.

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo -
description: Beautiful spot to park and sleep. In the middle of a mountain road that leads to the top of the mountain where there are many trials and space for cycling or motocross. Very calm, almost no traffic. Pure silence in the night.

title: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Veigas
title_short: (4905) Moreira de Geraz do Lima - Veigas
description: Next to the Lanheses Dock, this lovely riverside spot is a gem to park your motorhome for a day or a night. Access is also easy with larger mobile homes. The dock has its own paved car park, however these are too narrow and preferred by the locals, so use the gravel/grass space on the left (max 3 RVs). Lots of people walk and bike during the day, but it's quiet at night. Picnic tables, hiking trails, green river landscape. At the end of the playground on the left, in the direction of the village, there is an outhouse.

name: Camping Ave
title: (4480) Camping Ave
description:
For nature lovers

Welcome to the Camping Ave, located on one of the largest courses of water in northern Portugal – Rio Ave, which will flow into the Atlantic Ocean, a distance of few kilometres. The beaches of Vila do Conde and Póvoa de Varzim, are the sites closest to the park for all salt-water beachgoers.
Perfectly framed in nature, which has enriched with its vegetation carefully selected with care to preserve the national species and in order to move closer to vegetation in northern Europe.
Here it is natural to enjoy a peaceful scenario, ideal for nature lovers, and all those whose work and stress of life that we live call for a break, either on holiday or weekends, as great way to regain energy.
For those who prefer urban centers, with all their social, gastronomy, monuments, recreation and culture, Camping Ave is equidistant from the various urban centers of northern Portugal, to know: Vila do Conde, Póvoa de Varzim, Porto, Vila Nova de Famalicão, Trofa, Barcelos, Braga…
Thank you for your inquiry and look forward to your visit.

title: (4900) - Rua do Lumiar
description: Great spot to park right in the front of the beach! It's a pavmented parking place with good access and quiet! Not that much other campers parking here, which is perfect! Nice place to get a walk at the sunset because there's a wooden walkside with several kms! Great place to joy the sea nature! Not the best place to do swim at the sea because it,s plenty of rocks!

title: () - 58 Rua do Lumiar
description: Nice place to stop for the day and night. Beautiful sunset. Paved road access, no convenience, no water, no electricity.

title: (4730) Escariz (São Martinho) - 7 EM540
description: Parking place at the foot of a beautiful church. Very calm. No church bells between 10 p.m. and 7 p.m.

title: (4700) Mire de Tibães - Av. de Rio
title_short: (4700) Mire de Tibães - Av. de Rio
description: Nice shaded spot for a swim, lunch or a quite night. There is a small bar (from the local football club) for drinks. Owner offered us electricity for the night! Disadvantage is the church opposite the river Csvado that is very loud at 8 o'clock.

title: (4900) Viana do Castelo - Unnamed Road
description: Great nature spot if you want to be completely alone in the wild up high overlooking the coast - found this on a mountain bike ride requires some off road access but a van would be ok (just checking to see if there are road directions), will update if access is ok

title: (4485) Mindelo - 227 Rua Eça de Queirós
description: Parking of Mindelo Station. Perfect for parking during the day and visiting Porto. You have to take a Z5 card to reach the center of Porto in 40 minutes.

title: (4900) R. do Portinho - 236 Avenida da Praia
title_short: (4900) R. do Portinho - 236 Avenida da Praia
description: Public parking day and night. There is a bar/restaurant by the beach less then 5 minutes north where there are showers and water (not sure if drinkable). Right by the beach, stunning views and great walks for miles.  Very quiet at night but lots of people during the day.

title: (4485) Mindelo - 693 N13
description: Air and fresh water at the gas station.

title: (4900) - 112 Avenida da Praia
description: Mixed parking. Next to a beautiful and quiet beach. Showers and restaurant next door. Perfect to spend the day or night. Super quiet

title: (4990) Ecovia - Ecovia
description: Snack park

title: (4700) Mire de Tibães - CM1321
description: Parking to visit the splendid monastery. Attention closing on Monday

title: (4700-565) Mire de Tibães -
description: Possibility of day and night parking at the entrance to the esplanade before the entrance to the “Tibaes monastery”. The monastery to visit (3 stars in the backpacker's guide) also has a possibility of accommodation (hotel). Very calm…

title: (4900) - 53 Rua de Suavila
description: At the end of a small road, some parking spaces to park with sea view. Quiet (just the sound of the waves!). No on-site service. Small vehicle only

title: (4770) Cruz - 480 Largo Senhor dos Aflitos
description: Children's playground and picnic area next to a church.

title: (4900) Carreço - 336 Rua de Mogada
description: drinking water supply

title: (4485) Vila Chã - 139 Rua da Laderça
description: Public parking with great views of the sea. No supply. Small snack available.

title: (4760-010) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 126 Avenida do Brasil
title_short: (4760-010) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 126 Avenida do Brasil
description: Very clean self-service laundry. Open from 8 am to 11 pm

title: (4900) Carreço - 769 Avenida de Paço
description: An amazing Albergue to visit with dorm beds available too. The owner, Hugo is fantastic and his sidekick, Alex, extremely helpful. They have a dining area (indoor and outdoor), pool and very clean bathrooms and showers. And a Weber BBQ too!! There is space for up to four campers/overlanders. Cyclists with tents also welcomed. Bars, social clubs, mini market and an ace restaurant super close. Sea views and mountains with wild horses easily accessible. Loved this place!!

name: Vila Chã Camping
title: (4485) Vila Chã Camping
description:
Once you see the blue camping signs,  turn off Sat Nav. DO NOT turn left at the crossroads, signed dead end you will get stuck. Go straight on until you see another blue camp sign = Porto.
Few km away from Humberto Delgado airport.
Quiet site with good washrooms and showers. A well stocked shop all year used by locals on site and a bar.
There is a restaurant on site and one just outside.
The beaches are lovely and one has a safe bathing area with lifeguards. All are 10 min walking. I was told to be very careful of leaving my bike at the Metro station as it could get stolen.

title: (4760-409) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 332 Avenida Marechal Humberto Delgado
title_short: (4760-409) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 332 Avenida Marechal Humberto Delgado
description: Parking next to the park.

title: (4785) Trofa - 318 Rua Doutor António Faria
description: Picnic park, quiet but without services. There are tables and cozy shade. There are two tables, it is in the middle of a town in a large park.

title: (4700) Braga - 32 Rua de Ruães
description: Beautiful quiet and flat location on a paved surface. Fantastic view of the river Cávado with many picnick tables on the grass. There are plenty of trees but also open places to park the camper (bus). The road there is narrow but accessible. No facilities such as water and electricity.

title: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
title_short: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
description: Flat, grassy terrain with plenty of places to stand. No prohibition sign. Very quiet because at the end of a road. Local fishermen are there as are young lovers trying to count flowers in their car. You are at the water's edge and under the trees. Hard to get over !!! Also, the photos of the place in front (paved parking lot) were probably taken there. Please keep this place clean as it is only 15 minutes from Braga.

title: (4485-702) Vila Chã - 151 Rua da Praia Nova
title_short: (4485-702) Vila Chã - 151 Rua da Praia Nova
description: Parking day and night in front of the beach with beach bar shower bathrooms with schedule. It is a quiet place with small beach. For those who seek tranquility.

title: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
title_short: (4730-452) Vila de Prado - 22 Travessa da Fontainha
description: Location in the shade under the trees to rest and eat in front of the water and a kiwi field. Flat ground - please leave the area clean.

title: (4485) Modivas - Av. Fonte Cova 400 400
description: Fashion Outlet Porto ... free daily parking with metro connection to the city center ... 3.40 single ticket..Trinidad get off

title: (4760) Ribeirão - 5 Avenida Central
description:
Quiet place to spend the night, we went to visit the Atlantic bird contest.


It's like the back of a shopping center, where trucks usually spend the night. There are public toilets that were surprisingly clean. The street is illuminated with streetlights.

title: (4485-864) Vila Chã - 21 Largo dos Pescadores
description: Free toilet by the sea

title: (4770) Sezures - 422 Avenida das Cerdeirinhas
description: Mandatory stopping place. Quiet, lots of drinking water. Tables, covered area, curtains, great views.

title: (4760) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 5 Rua Frei Bartolomeu dos Mártires
title_short: (4760) Vila Nova de Famalicão - 5 Rua Frei Bartolomeu dos Mártires
description: Parking next to the new Church of Santiago de Antas. Quiet and fairly smooth place to stop to eat. we don't sleep here. but on a weekday it was empty.

title: (4900) - Unnamed Road
description: Large parking flat beach supervised snack wc water beach shower

title: (4705) São Pedro De Oliveira - Tv. da Volta do Carro
title_short: (4705) São Pedro De Oliveira - Tv. da Volta do Carro
description: The parking lot of a free public swimming pool (9am-10pm) with many tables and benches and a grill. There is also a kiosk selling ice cream and drinks on site. However, this is not always open. Officially, however, this is only for the residents of the area. The front parking lot is easy to see and sunny, the rear one is a bit quieter and shady.

title: (4700) Parada de Tibães - R. de Sao Goncalo
title_short: (4700) Parada de Tibães - R. de Sao Goncalo
description: Clean and very recent laundry room with WC and wifi. Payment only in cash.

title: (4700) Merelim (São Paio) - 36 Rua João Dias Soares
title_short: (4700) Merelim (São Paio) - 36 Rua João Dias Soares
description: It is a parking lot on a river beach. To spend the night it is quiet but in non-summer months as it will be very crowded. Ideal for vans and AC no more than 6m. The squares are not very big.

title: (4730-450) Prado - 23 Largo Antunes Lima
description:
São Sebastião, Vila de Prado      
Terça-feira de manhã é dia de feira semanal -
Tuesday morning is weekly market day -
Le mardi matin est le jour du marché hebdomadaire - El martes por la mañana es el día de mercado semanal

title: (4730-458) Vila de Prado - N201
description: Fuel pump. Supermarket. Washing machine. The bakery. kiosk. ATM

title: (4990) Correlhã -
description: Nice spot with a lot of trees. Nice picnic area and very calm possible to overnight. Natural water source in the picnic park and a Snack bar. A few meters away a very nice and good restaurant with Portuguese traditional food. (Better to make reservation in advance)

title: (4485) Vila Chã - 405 Avenida dos Banhos
description: Small sand parking between the beach and the cornfields. suitable for one or two vans, be careful for large camping because turning around can be difficult ... small village 3min walk with bar and restaurant. perfect for a quiet night with sea views.

title: (4745) Alvarelhos - Avenida do Santuário
description: Great sunrise and far views in all directions on a hilltop next to a church. Two small bars/restaurants are nearby. The water tap is accessible. When I was there in October, the toilets were closed and there was no event going on at the church. You have to make friends with the sound of the bell, since it rings from 6 in the morning until 22h. Perfect for morning meditation, since the bell make sure that you stay focused ;)

title: (4705-444) Celeirós - 87 Avenida de São Lourenço
description: Self service wash and dry

title: (4785) Trofa - 647 Rua Cónegos de Landim
description: Small car park opposite the main market square (Attention: market from 6 a.m. to 2 p.m. only on Saturdays). Quiet place, not too much traffic at night. Ideal for troubleshooting one night.

title: (4700) Real - 513 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: 3 places for motorhomes in the parking lot of a shopping center, in uber about 4 euros to the center.

title: (4990) Correlhã - 35 EM536
description: Village fountain - antique washing place. Very large water flow. Have a good round trip. Space for 2 mobiles, also longer ones. Water can only be removed with a watering can or bucket, as the pipe has a very large diameter.

title: (4900-012) Afife - Caminho da Arda
description: Arda playa Afife, surf and bathing beach, beach bar, toilets open the day

title: (4705-265) Braga - Unnamed Road
description:
Laundromat, a little expensive.
located behind Leclerc, parking accessible by going around

title: (4485) Labruge - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to spend the night and some days inclusive, beachfront

title: (4730) Vila de Prado - Avenida do Cávado
title_short: (4730) Vila de Prado - Avenida do Cávado
description: Vila de Prado, Cávado River, Nice river beach Faial Restaurant, Police and Health care near.
